name: ScreenOverlay

types.name: ScreenOverlay
types.comment: An opaque type to store in the model that represents the overlay state and html content

values.name: initOverlay
values.comment: Create a ScreenOverlay with no html content

values.name: isOverlayVisible
values.comment: For determining if the overlay is visible or not

values.name: noXOverlayView
values.comment: Same as `overlayView` but without the (X) - close button

values.name: overlayView
values.comment:
Add this to the view to add the overlay screen content to the dom
Accepts the ScreenOverlay , a closeMsg that is fired when x (close) button is clicked,
and the markup to add to the overlay
values.type: ScreenOverlay.ScreenOverlay -> msg -> Html.Html msg -> Html.Html msg

values.name: withOverlayStyles
values.comment: Update a ScreenOverlay with styles to override the default styling
